Defining URL:http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut-scheduling/ValueSet/service
Name:Argonaut Scheduling Services
Definition:

​The service types offered by providers and that is to be performed during this appointment. These concepts are used in the FHIR Appointment, Schedule and Slot resources. The Argonaut Scheduling Visit Types are mapped to these concepts

Copyright:This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
Source ResourceXML / JSON / Turtle
  • Argonaut Appointment Output Profile

Argonaut Scheduling Services

The service types offered by providers and that is to be performed during this appointment. These concepts are used in the FHIR Appointment, Schedule and Slot resources. The Argonaut Scheduling Visit Types are mapped to these concepts

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    11429006Consultation (procedure)
    185387006New patient consultation (procedure)
    310058008Nuclear medicine service (procedure)
    439740005Postoperative follow-up visit (procedure)
    406153003Pre-admission assessment (procedure)
    77132007Therapeutic procedure (procedure)
    406153003Pre-admission assessment (procedure)
    241686001Dual energy X-ray photon absorptiometry (procedure)
    40701008Echocardiography (procedure)
    433233004Exercise stress echocardiography (procedure)
    409073007Education (procedure)
    54550000Electroencephalogram (procedure)
    29303009Electrocardiographic procedure (procedure)
    386053000Evaluation procedure (procedure)
    86198006Influenza vaccination (procedure)
    44491008Fluoroscopy (procedure)
    281036007Follow-up consultation (procedure)
    439708006Home visit (procedure)
    59108006Injection (procedure)
    5880005Physical examination procedure (procedure)
    71388002Procedure (procedure)
    76746007Cardiovascular stress testing (procedure)
    7922000General treatment (procedure)
    410620009Well child visit (procedure)
    127785005Administration of substance to produce immunity, either active or passive (procedure)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 224930009
